text: is the first Japanese daily sports newspaper, having been founded in 1948. In a 1997 report it was called one of the "Big Three" sports papers in Japan, out of a field of 17 sports dailies. It is an affiliate newspaper of the Mainichi Shimbun. == See also == *Masters GC Ladies *Miss Nippon *Mizuno Classic == References == == External links == * Category:Daily newspapers published in Japan Category:Sports newspapers published in Japan Category:Publications established in 1948 Category:1948 establishments in Japan
title: Sports Nippon
